metadata.description: Research-driven project scaffolding with design systems for mobile, backend, and web applications. Supports SwiftUI, Jetpack Compose, Kotlin XML, Flutter, Expo React Native, Node/Express, FastAPI, Flask, Django, Rust, Next.js, and Nuxt.js.

plugins.name: eagle-multi-stack-scaffolder
plugins.description: Research-driven scaffolding with design systems for SwiftUI, Jetpack Compose, Kotlin XML, Flutter, Expo React Native, Node/Express, FastAPI, Flask, Django, Rust, Next.js, and Nuxt.js. Includes Material 3, Cupertino, NativeWind patterns. Automatically researches best practices, recommends dependencies, and generates production-ready project structures.
